titles: A vindication of the honour of King Charles I against the prodigious calumnies of the regicide, Ludlow, publisht in what he calls A letter from Major-General Ludlow to Sir E.S.
author: Elys, Edmund, ca. 1634-ca. 1707.
notes: Attributed to Edmund Elys. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
Imperfect: filmed copy dark and partially illegible with print show-through.
keywords: Ludlow, Edmund, fl. 1691-1692. --  Letter to Sir E.S. comparing the tyranny of the first four years of King Charles the martyr, with the tyranny of the four years reign of the late abdicated king.
